#include"stdio.h"
#include"stdlib.h"
int main()
{
	unsigned int N=100001;
	unsigned long long res[N];
	res[0]=res[1]=res[2]=res[3]=0;
	unsigned long long i=4;
	while(i<N)
	{
		res[i]=res[i-1]+ ((((i*(i-3))>>1) - ((i-3)>>1))>>1);
		i++;
// 		printf("%d\n",i);
	}
	int T=1;
	scanf("%d",&T);
	while(T--)
	{
		int x;
		scanf("%d",&x);
		printf("%llu\n",res[x]);
	}
}
//2499900001
//83329583375000
